title: Blended Emergency Pedagogy-Based Research Competency Enhancement Program for Clinical Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Clinical practice experience, foundational understanding of basic research methodologies
context.additional_context: A customized educational curriculum for practicing clinical nurses to solve research problems encountered in real-world settings.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze research problems arising in clinical settings and write a research design proposal
Learners can perform research data collection and analysis processes using simulation/VR tools in a blended learning environment
Through project-based assessment, learners can derive and present research outcomes applicable to real-world clinical problems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
